body.p: The affiant Enoch Hooper states that the accused Chas, hooper in 1861 joined the 3rd Ky. Rebel regiment and remained in it up to the time of the Fordt Donaldson fight, in 1862, after which he joined a Regiment of Rebel Cavalry under Command of Col. Thomas Woodard & belonged to Woodards Regiment at the time the Command took the goods for which Chas, Hooper is Indicted in the Caldwell Circuit Court
Subscribed & sworne to before me by Enoch Hooper before me
